about_the_game: Prepare to dance till you’re dead in this horrifying yet captivating experience! A mysterious benefactor invites you to a private party... in Romania! Exciting, isn't it? Well, Annabelle is positively ecstatic, so all you can do now is pack your largest suitcase and print out the plane tickets. Make sure you don't forget your Halloween costume, though! A shimmering light in the dark mountains leads you to a gloomy castle. Welcome to Frightsylvania Hotel – your home away from home, where comfort meets mystery and luxury intertwines with secrets. Maybe a few monsters and death traps as well. Wander through the labyrinth of looming halls and underground tunnels and don't mind the itchy feeling in the back of your head like someone's watching you. Because they are…
